0110100010100110 0001001100110110 1 -> sum: 0111101111011101, cout: 0
1110110010000101 0101010100001011 0 -> sum: 0100000110010000, cout: 1
0101101110001010 0001010100011100 1 -> sum: 0111000010100111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
